content: Great piece! We are working hard at California PUC to figure out how to improve access to poles and conduits for many of the reasons mentioned here. We just had an all day workshop on that last Friday: http://cpuc.ca.gov/calEvent.aspx?id=6442452792If anyone is interested in this work and wants to receive emails with updates, shoot me a note: eim (at) cpuc.ca.gov
